channel.title: [Q] Big sized client SOLVED
channel.description:
well i have decided to start working on a big client i have made the size 800x600
Source : demonik v7 _____________________________________________________________________
Problem: the problem is that when i right click on an inventory item it does nothing but when i right click on an object it works fine.
All help would be deeply appreciated
_____________________________________________________________________
solution : I searched the [code]private final void checkMouseStatus() { [/code] "like adu said" and then found this
[code] if (menuX + menuWidth > 510) menuX = 510 - menuWidth; if (menuY + menuHeight > 315) menuY = 315 - menuHeight;[/code] changed both of the 510 to 798 after that i changed both of the 315 to 581.

item.title: [Q] Big sized client SOLVED
item.dc:creator: @Fiercepk Fiercepk
item.description:
@Fiercepk wrote:

well i have decided to start working on a big client i have made the size 800x600

Source : demonik v7

Problem: the problem is that when i right click on an inventory item it does nothing but when i right click on an object it works fine.

All help would be deeply appreciated

solution : I searched the

private final void checkMouseStatus() {

“like adu said” and then found this

if (menuX + menuWidth > 510) menuX = 510 - menuWidth; if (menuY + menuHeight > 315) menuY = 315 - menuHeight;
changed both of the 510 to 798 after that i
changed both of the 315 to 581.

Read full topic
